## Overview
This release of **RGM** includes stability improvements, packaging updates, and UI refinements.

## Installation
- **Debian/Ubuntu**: install the `.deb` package
- **Fedora/RHEL/openSUSE**: install the `.rpm` package
- **Other Linux**: extract `rgm-linux-x86_64.tar.gz` and run `rgm`

## Notes
- App launcher integration (`.desktop` + icons) is included in Linux packages.
